sentences.sContent: You don’t have to be the executor of the full idea, but as a problem solver, you have some responsibility for implementing the solution.
sentences.sContent_eng: You don’t have to be the executor of the full idea, but as a problem solver, you have some responsibility for implementing the solution.
sentences.sCn: 你不需要是整个计划的执行者，但作为一个解决问题者，你对整个方案的执行仍负有一定的责任。

words.tran: 行政的；经营的；执行的，经营管理的
经理；执行委员会；执行者；经理主管人员

trans.tranCn: 执行者；[法] 遗嘱执行人
trans.tranOther: someone who deals with the instructions in someone’s will
